Title: Bubsy in Claws Encounters of the Furred Kind
SortingTitle: Bubsy in Claws Encounters of the Furred Kind
Description: In this 15-level action game the player is Bubsy the bobcat, who has to defeat the Woolies the aliens, which steal balls of yarn. There are five different locations such as jungle, wild west, etc., where the player has to jump and land on their enemies to kill them. Each time to finish the level the player has to defeat the boss, who sits in an alien ship.
